price: Namni toltuu (qabeenya) kadhachuu irraa hin hifatu. Yeroo hamtuun (hiyyummaan) isa tuqe akkaan abdii murataa, mufataa ta’a.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yasamu al-insānu min duʿāi al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayaūsun qanūṭun
